mean_cn: n.展览（会）；陈列；(技能的) 展示
mean_en: an event at which objects (such as works of art) are put out in a public space for people to look at; a public show of something
sentence: The teacher took the students to an art exhibition.
sentence_trans: 老师带学生们去参观了一个艺术展。
word_etyma: ex出 + hibit拿住 + ion名词后缀 → 拿出去给人看 → 展览；陈列
